flexjson
Interface Transformer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DateTransformer, HTMLEncoder
public interface Transformer

Transformers are used to alter the values written to a Flexjson stream. This allows you to modify your data for use with HTML, security like stripping out <script> tags, or rendering HTML from simple markups like markdown or other technologies. Use JSONSerializer.transform(flexjson.Transformer, java.lang.String...) to register a Transformer to with a JSONSerializer.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String transform(java.lang.Object value)
